WEB DESIGNER

Ramzi Fartas

I'm ramzi,an independant degital designer from algeria. i usually work with vanilla javascript without frameork for small projects, allowing me a complete freedom on architecture, a headless cms like prismic for content management, gsap for animations and three.js for webGl.
